heading: Alpha Streams Market
content:
Alpha Streams is a global marketplace where quants and investors meet. Quants offer their Alpha (algorithms) for licensing and investors can quickly locate crowd-sourced strategies that fit their target criteria. QuantConnect acts as an independent third-party to verify the strategy performance and run it out-of-sample in our production environment with live market data.

Community Designs Algorithms

QuantConnect Reviews and Hosts

Investors License Alpha for Trading
